content: a game of thrones is the first book in a song of ice and fire a series of novels by author george r r martin the story of a song of ice and fire takes place mainly on the continent of westeros although now in exile **house** **targaryen** is one of the great houses of westeros it s sigil is a 3-headed **dragon** this stitch pattern reminds me of dragon scales i have not included specific instructions for heels or toes please use your favorite technique for knitting those portions of your socks also i have only included directions for one size medium to make this pattern larger or smaller i suggest experimenting with a larger or smaller needle size pattern is also adjustable using increments of 8 keep in mind that the finished sock is somewhat flexible as it is ribbed i suggest using either a light sport weight or a heavy fingering weight yarn
